document.full_text: ratings agency fitch on friday cut its outlook on japan's sovereign debt, warning that the vast cost of a march earthquake and tsunami and the still-unknown bill for the clean-up after the nuclear disaster would further strain the country's already shaky public finances.
document.title: fitch cuts japan credit rating outlook to negative
lines_and_colors: ratings agency fitch on friday cut its outlook on japan's sovereign debt, warning that the vast cost of a march earthquake and tsunami and the still-unknown bill for the clean-up after the nuclear disaster would further strain the country's already shaky public finances.
